description: Security closing price adjusted to account for any corporate action after closing.
Security price when the financial market is closed for the day.
Securities highest trading price in the time period.
Securities lowest trading price in the time period.
Securities price at the open of the financial market.
The amount of an asset or security which changes ownership over time.
The upper value for the predicted value CI (y^ upper).
The lower value for the predicted value CI (y^ lower).
The mean error. Does not measure the magnitude of errors.
The mean absolute error. Measures the magnitude of errors, not direction.
The root mean squared error. Increases significance of large errors.
